Reviews.Title: Specs look so good...picture quality not so much!
Reviews.Author: E. Adams "Loves MLS Soccer"
Reviews.Content: This camera has terrific specs.  It sports a large LCD screen.  HD movie capture.  However, there are deal breaking (return pending) cracks for me:PROS:- very good macro (closeup - 2-9 inches) shots with fine detail- 720p HD capture is easy, good quality- shake compensation (but it is digital)CONS:- Poor light/contrast on shots (shot look dull)- Pictures at low ISOs are VERY noisy- Zoomed shots are very noisy- LCD has 10% taken up by menu (right side)- Ergonomics awkward with grip[...]

Reviews.Title: Complete Garbage
Reviews.Author: Wahyit Cheung "Wahyit Cheung"
Reviews.Content: Where to begin. Well the camera has terrible picture quality, when you look on the computer it looks grainy and blurry regardless of the settings. Also after a few pictures the camera begins to give you a "please wait" after each shot and to get rid of it you have to go to factory reset. To top it off I sent it to Casio and a "technician" that i spoke to over the phone and showed little to no concern. Don't every buy Casio spend a few bucks more and get a Canon. My Droid 5 Mega Pixel phone camera works better.
